TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CountdownEvent extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示在计数变为零时处于有信号状态的同步基元。

span.span: Represents a synchronization primitive that is signaled when its count reaches zero.

Docs.threadsafe:
所有公共和受保护成员是线程安全的可同时从多个线程，Dispose 除外，它必须仅使用时使用上的所有其他操作已完成，并且将重置，这应只用于在没有其他线程访问事件时。
All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, with the exception of Dispose, which must only be used when all other operations on the have completed, and Reset, which should only be used when no other threads are accessing the event.
示例
Example
下面的示例演示如何使用:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 为 true 则释放托管资源和非托管资源；为 false 则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the , and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与大多数的成员不同，不是线程安全的不能与此实例的其他成员同时使用。Unlike most of the members of , is not thread-safe and may not be used concurrently with other members of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会引发倒计时已达到零时发生的事件。The does not raise an event when the countdown has reached zero. 相反，属性值等于零，和属性等于`true`。Instead, the property equals zero, and the property equals `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Wait() cil managed

summary.span: 阻止当前线程，直到设置了 为止。

span.span: Blocks the current thread until the is set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将阻塞，直到当前实例无限期的调用方是设置。The caller of this method blocks indefinitely until the current instance is set. 如果该事件处于当前设置状态，调用方将立即返回。The caller will return immediately if the event is currently in a set state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应仅用于必要与拥有 WaitHandle 的基本代码的集成。 should only be used if it's needed for integration with code bases that rely on having a WaitHandle. 如果所有所需等待要设置方法应为首选。If all that's needed is to wait for the to be set, the method should be preferred.
